title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including user authentication scenarios, security standards (e.g., FIDO U2F, OAuth 2.0), performance criteria (minimum response time under 100ms, scalability to millions of users), integration with existing systems (Single Sign-On support, API documentation), data privacy and compliance regulations (GDPR, HIPAA, CCPA), ethical considerations for biometric data collection and storage (informed consent, data anonymization), user consent and data deletion mechanisms, potential risks and mitigation strategies (data breaches, unauthorized access), and test cases for each requirement.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for brainwave data acquisition, processing, storage, and authentication.

title: Develop Brainwave Data Acquisition Module
description: Implement the module responsible for capturing and preprocessing brainwave data from users.

title: Implement Brainwave Pattern Recognition Algorithm
description: Develop the algorithm for analyzing and recognizing unique brainwave patterns for user authentication.

title: Design and Implement User Authentication Flow
description: Design and implement the user authentication flow, including enrollment, verification, and error handling.

title: Develop Database Schema and Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user brainwave patterns and authentication data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures, such as data encryption, access controls, and audit logging, to ensure the system's integrity and user privacy.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance tests, to ensure the system's functionality and reliability.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment Pipeline
description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline for automated builds, testing, and deployment to various environments.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Prepare technical documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides.
